website_summaries.verdict: Traction like what you’d expect on car tires is what you’ll get with the Aggressor 4. The unique underside construction also delivers flexibility which helps wrestlers be aggressive on the mat. Meanwhile, untied laces won’t be a problem with the Velcro lace garage on this model. This line has stayed true to its roots, making it a top pick for many.
pros: Almost all of the wrestlers have been impressed with how grippy the outsole of the Aggressor 4 is on the mat
This trainer is described as one of the most comfortable iterations of the Aggressor model
According to many consumers, the product is reasonably priced
Multiple athletes like how stable their feet feel while wearing this pair of Asics wrestling shoes
More than a few buyers admire the style of the product
cons: As noted by several reviewers, the Aggressor 4 needs a break-in period because it feels stiff
The durability of the footgear has been criticized because some parts have fallen apart after a few times of use

customer_reviews.title: PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: I did tons and tons of research before picking which wrestling shoe to buy next....so this one was at the top of my list. However when I put it on, the top/inside part of the shoe puts insane pressure on the outter part of my foot, like someone was driving a knife into my foot. I wore it for 10 minutes and could barely walk and when I took it off my foot was red & hurting in that area. I returned that pair thinking they might just be defective and bought 1 size bigger. But the same happened with the new pair. Very bummed because these shoes look s i c k. Maybe I just have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe with weird sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but the toe box is super tight. If you're doing boxing this week make some of your maneuvering much easier. I was using running shoes and pivoting was very diffciult. Now my feet slide much easier but I still feel as though I have stability.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: True fit, don’t buy too big, wrestling shoes need to fit exact, almost tight.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing Aggressors for the past 3 years, he wore other ASICS in the past but prefers the Aggressors because the tread comes up higher which is important when your feet are digging into the mat. I bought size 11 for him when he wears a size 10.5 shoe. He has less than a half inch for growth and could barely get them on. He said they are “tight, but wrestling shoes”. They will stretch a bit even though they are synthetic material. He is 13 years old now and grew 5 1/2 inches in height this last year. Just a warning to parents of 12 year old boys.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with my order. The wrestling shoes fit my son perfectly and he was pleased with them as far as style and comfort. Size and style was well described and delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Champion makers!
customer_reviews.text: Omg someone said this show changes your game and turns you into a champion. ITS SO TRUE!! my daughter went from not winning a single match to winning the whole league championship for her weight after she started wearing these shoes I got for her!! I could not believe it!! My daughter says this shoe gives her so much more support than her former Nike mat shoes. They also look super cool! We LOVELOVELOVE these SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Maia Mello

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe that does take a little while to break in. My son uses two shoes because the practices are so hard. He has a tournament or match shoe that he uses for competition and then he has this shoe that he uses for practice. He has 2 practices a day and those practices are brutal on your shoes. These shoes hold up to the wear and tear of practices.
customer_reviews.author: S_T_N

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of wrestling Asics aggressors I purchased. I got them for my son. He still uses his last pair for backup or practice. Can't say enough good things about them. They are excellent with design, traction, flexibility and durability. Very happy with these wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: We’ve got a new ASICS Fan in the house!
customer_reviews.text: These took my son to 3rd place at State this year! He said they broke in easily, and gave his ankles great protection and support. He’s always been an Adidas kid...but loves these shoes! May have helped him cross over. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Very hard! And narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Will return, narrow even on my foot! (Small and skinny) Main issue of this shoes it’s too Hard! Block you movements! Very uncomfortable! Actually ASICS #1 of wrestling shoes! But this one made like by Apple or another company who very far from Wrestling! Like regular hard shoes! Shoes for fall! Wrestling shoes Must be Soft!
customer_reviews.author: Aidar

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: I was not very willing to spend the money on yet another pair of wrestling shoes. My son will go through two in one season. But he insisted these were the best. Well, they are! They have held up so well! Not even a little pull from the sole. ( my son’s favorite place to have shoes fall apart). They are comfortable (he says) and the grip on the mat is slip proof. Overall these have been amazing! One season in and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for boxing!
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for boxing! They're great for boxing! I wish Asics sold their boxing shoes in the US, but these will do. They do require a break in period because they are tight. Just wear them in your house for a few days before performing in them. Once they're broken in, they feel so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair and they work perfect for lifting weights. I’m not as c x p
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fits great. I usually wear wrestling shoes when I preform deadlifts and squats. I have yet to try them out I will later this week,
customer_reviews.author: The Q-Man

customer_reviews.title: They are so awesome to look at.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. Make sure you buy a size up from your normal size. They are snug.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome wrestling shoes. By far the best I’ve used in my 45 years participating in the great sport of wrestling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few practices for the grip to show up. Stitching is not as good as the original Rulons.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! They fit well and look nice on the mat! 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: ThreeTboys

customer_reviews.title: They had to fit
customer_reviews.text: I had an artist custom paint them for my son in his senior year district championship win. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: WILL W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for wrestling, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my sons favorite wrestling shoes. It’s his 3rd pair. So glad to have gotten them now that this version and color are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanted Extras

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new shoes. Fit perfect. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great produt, I originally purchased the same model from another company and when my brother asked for the same ones I checked Amazon and found these for about 30 bucks cheaper...these shoes are both beautiful and rugged
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I’ll only buy aggressors from here on out
customer_reviews.text: Aggressors are great for wrestlers with turf toe. The soles are durable and you’ll get your money’s worth. These shoes look great as well. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: Henson

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 year old son and he says they are very comfortable. Fit to size and very bendable. Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These were extremely thin shoes I don't have wide feet these were just all Too Thai
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best wrestling shoes I've ever had. But it was not so easy to find the right size. I had to order three different sizes and my regular shoe size fits perfectly. The other ones were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: The shoes started to fall apart after only a month of being used
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great wrestling shoes and very comfortable. You will be wrestling like Jordan Burroughs in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Went to a store to try on ASICS and adidas to make sure would fit before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's 3rd pair or wreslting shoes and these are by far some of the best. Great grip nice and durable quality built.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: They will make you 10x stronger!!
customer_reviews.text: These Adeline Gray Asics wrestling shoes will take your game to the next level. Do you want to be great? Train hard and wear these shoes. You might get 4 world titles too!
customer_reviews.author: Taco Salad

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, the gold is less yellow than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cassyc

customer_reviews.title: Product did not fit true to size. I recommend getting a 11.5 if your size is a 10.5
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking shoe . The quality is Great . Shoe just was too tight around the top side of the foot by the toes or bottom of shoelace area in both a 10.5 & 11 . I comfortably wear 10.5 in every pair of shoes of this kind.
customer_reviews.author: Sean daniels

customer_reviews.title: Labeled wrong
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing wrong with the shoe. It may be mislabeled. After ordering this shoe twice we received the wrong shoe both times. We received aggressor snapdowns instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bates

customer_reviews.title: good solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: first pair lasted 6 years 2 years competing 4 coaching
customer_reviews.author: David Botting

customer_reviews.title: Extremely narrow toebox
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet, and the Aggressor gives me the sharp pain on the side of my big toes after 5 minutes of wearing them. Beware to purchase them no matter how cool they look.
customer_reviews.author: Minsoo Shin

customer_reviews.title: Durable comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My sone loves them true to size! And fair price. Goes well with black laces my picture is late he wore them all season and usually i have to buy 2 pairs a season
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great and solid wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had aggressors in the past these ones fall right in line with them. They are Narrower than I thought but after breaking them in they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Show is narrow
customer_reviews.text: Liked the looked, but smaller very narrow and my son has a narrow foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe and ASICS are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe and ASICS are awesome. Could not find them in local stores. Took son to stores looking and tried other ASICS on for sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes work great for my son. They have really good traction on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Peed

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. My son loves them. A little hard to get on, but I believe that is expected with any wrestling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie M

customer_reviews.title: Soles fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I am the head junior high coach. The soles of this shoe didn’t make it through the junior high season. Need a new pair for high school season.....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Castillon

customer_reviews.title: Sports R Kool, fine print (somewhere?)
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: Sports R Kool charges $19 shipping if these are sent back, no matter condition. The Koi color is orange and fitting is odd.
customer_reviews.author: Aristocles

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but fits super tight even with 1 size up.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff soon you get them breaks in nice, so much grip on the mat. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Burke

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After three months of use, the sole of the shoe is starting to come a part. For a expensive pair of wrestling shoes they shouldn’t do this.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Aggressor 4
customer_reviews.text: Great when gripping the mat in practice but once sweat gets on them you loose that grip you once had.
customer_reviews.author: Hector M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for wrestling
customer_reviews.text: Tried this shoes for wrestling and boxing and BJJ. It's best for wrestling not for boxing. Durable and support strong grabbing for movement in any direction.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them. He says they're real comfortable and have good grip on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: misspr1

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but need to orser a 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hearst

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit, not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit real tight at first, but broken in they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Travi Silva

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered accordingly but the shoes are too small and my son needed them for 3 matches and a tournament.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Always order a size up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. They have great support compared to a cheaper shoe
customer_reviews.author: Nichy T

customer_reviews.title: Expert service
customer_reviews.text: I like the fast delivery. I purchased the wrestling shoes for,my grandson
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Little right but easy to break in
customer_reviews.text: A little tight but my feet are really wide. Very comfy to wrestle in. Easy to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes arrived just before a tournament. Great grip and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son wrestles heavyweight and it is hard to find shoes that fit him well. These shoes fit him great and have excellent grip. We will see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and ships fast. Order these shoes 2 sizes bigger than your normal size, they run very small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, good price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the look and feel of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Erin E Sharp

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Aggressor 4 Shoes
product_meta.description:
You're a mid-level wrestler in your early years of wrestling. You need great-fitting wrestling shoes with a tough sole that deliver durability and grip when you've got your opponent down on the mat. The AGGRESSOR 4 wrestling shoe is specially-engineered with ASICS technology for foot and ankle support and breathability for when things get heated. With a standout ASICS infinity logo bold and stylish design choices for you and your team, you'll wrong-foot the opposition right from the start. 
Weight: 8.48.
feature_bullets: DuoSole Outsole - Reduces weight and enhances flexibility while maintaining traction and durability.
